data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Runs consolidated "my clients" report". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

requestBody.title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Accidentally deletes availability rule, panics". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Quick setup wizard (service, hours, price, booking link)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
